body: there's another book from this series and I am curious about the first story lol
i only liked the first artist, the artist on page 188 and the last one lol
Would have been better if it was just that hot dude and the pink haired one.

Like 20% of this was worth drawing. Clearly I’m talking about the better tags: tomgirl, crossdressing. Not that I dislike feminization but I can’t understand. Then again, usually, it at least involves a trap or someone somewhat girly. The rest is just skipped fodder, gonna attribute it to more tags done by yet another baka uploader
